form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: U. S. DEPARTMENT OF LABOR Immigration Service District No. 31., Form 4 4 02/196 RE: WONG GUCK ON, Applicant for Form 4 02/196

full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/18/2023 U. S. DEPARTMENT OF LABOR Immigration Service District No. 31. No.8402/196 Office of Inspector in Charge, RE: WONG GUCK ON, Los Angeles,California, Applicant for Form 430: July 27, 1933. J.C.Nardini, Inspector & Stenographer, Henry Kwok, Interpreter. STATEMENT OF THE APPLICANT. STORN. Q Please state your name, place and date of birth, occupation and res- idence? A Wong Guck on,only name, single,born in CR 7-6-10 (July 17, 1918) in Sung Lung village, Sun Ning district, China: occupation, student; residence, 145 Suth Vermjuxt avenue , Los Angeles, Calif. Q Where have you lived since your admission last year? A I lived wi th my father at 1135 East 21st street, and then I moved to the present address. of Where is your father? A He works in the market near 21st street. His names are Wong Sedic Hong and long Choon Wat.He has no brothers or sisters that I know of. of Is your no ther living? A Yest her name is Kong Shee, about 43, and comes from the A1 Yung village, Sun Ning district, China. Sometimes she is sickly. or When did you last hear from your mother? A About a month ago my father received a letter from her, and he is sending me to Chinas How. Q Are you going to China with your brother, Wong Kwok Hai? A Yes. or How many children were born to your parents? A Five sons and one daughter. The 1st born is long Gold Doon, I dont know his marriage name, row in the United States somewhere. His wife is Lee Shee, but I dont know whether they have any children or not. They had none when I left for the United States. of Where is his wife living new? A In Lung Sing village; they moved dn OR 21 (1932) That village is very far away, or Why did she move?A Because there was not enough room in our house. of Who follows him? A Wong Gold Fay, I dont know his marriage name, now in China. His wife is Lee Shee, and has one son,Thing Soo Fat; no girls when I was there. They live in our house in the village. Q Who follow him? A Wong Gok Hai, 17, in Los Angeles, living at 145 So. Vermont avenue, this city, and attending school. Q Does he limp. A Yes.
